name: @churchsuite/embed
description: An easy-to-use script to allow simple integration of ChurchSuite's embed JSON feeds into your website. For more information, see https://kingshope.church.

scripts.build: esbuild cdn.min=src/cdn.js calendar.min=src/calendar.js bookings.min=src/bookings.js smallgroups.min=src/smallgroups.js --bundle --minify --outdir=dist --target=es6 && npm run replacePackageVersion
scripts.deploy: jest && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.embedv3: esbuild cdn.min=src/cdn.js calendar.min=src/calendar.js bookings.min=src/bookings.js smallgroups.min=src/smallgroups.js --bundle --minify --outdir=../embed-v3/public/js --target=es6 && grep "@package_version@" ../embed-v3/public/js -lr | xargs sed -i "" -e "s/@package_version@/$npm_package_version/g"

author: ChurchSuite Ltd.
